snippet.title: Heart of Africa - C64 - Best EA Games for C64 Computer (1985)
snippet.description:
Heart of Africa - C64. The sequel to Seven Cities of Gold, by Dan Bunten and Ozark Softscape, and one of the best EA games for the C64 computer.

A secret cache of history of EA has been dug up at 
The Dot Eaters:http://thedoteaters.com/?bitstory=computer/electronic-arts

http://www.thedoteaters.com  Video Game History 101

-~-~~-~~~-~~-~-
View the goofy glitch that makes playing Access Software's classic game Leader Board Golf so much fun: 
https://youtu.be/HnEN942x5rY
-~-~~-~~~-~~-~-
